204.heading: The Alps.
204.title: "A Quick Freeze with Hot Lead!"
204.author: [No author]
notes: Summary: Pete Trask has to recover documents that an American agent was carrying, after a big train wreck in the Alps. The Communists have caused the wreck, and Pete catches them after a chase that involves skiing and bobsledding.
